description.value:
Scarce Availability if acquired from Dark Eldar (or possibly Stryxis) Settlement(s). Liquid that can corrode through literally anything, must be stored in magnetic containment. Failing Toughness Test inflicts 1d10 Strength Damage, with +1 Damage per DoF on test.

Requirements

Good Craftsmanship can delay effect by 1 round, Best can delay by up to 24 hours, chosen on acquisition/creation. Temporarily replaces the "Toxic" Wep. Quality's effect if applied.

Effect: Near Unique

Notes: -
description.summary: Scarce Availability if acquired from Dark Eldar (or possibly Stryxis) Settlement(s). Liquid that can corrode through literally anything, must be stored in magnetic containment. Failing Toughness Test
